document.heading: Social E-Commerce Job Creation Tax Incentive Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-174, the “Social E-Commerce Job Creation Tax Incentive Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-755. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 26, 2012, and July 10, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 19, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-398 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-174 became effective on Oct. 9, 2012.
